column1: # DESCRIPTION: Promote DimMarketingOffer from spreadsheet sourced tables to DataStore

column2: FROM [schema].crm_activity_type WHERE (act_type_desc LIKE '%disconnection notice%' OR  act_type_desc LIKE '%complaint%' OR  act_type_desc LIKE '%enquiry%') AND (crm_activity_type.Meta_LatestUpdate_TaskExecutionInstanceId > @LatestSuccessfulTaskExecutionInstanceID)
